title: When will Ranked reset????
body:
Could riot or anyone identify the date of when the season will start for season 5....... I've been waiting and i think it will reset after New years Day... Please give me your thought about the Ranked System..... 

Thank you all                                {{champion:17}} {{champion:27}}

replies.body:
The ranking system and your ranking will most likely be soft reset at just prior to the commencement of Season 5. My best guess for the start of Season 5 is mid January. Running of the fact that Season 4 started on the 14.01.2014. 

Best of luck! 
lols =)
Well umm.. Riot hasn't told us yet. Just look at previous dates and make your estimate though.
LOLS Thats the information i was looking for thanks buddy... I just thought of that myself when did s4 start.. Man thanks alot
